slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/BaseSignerClient/experimental_createMultiOwner
---

This will create a multi-owner account with the current user and additional specified signers

## Import

```ts
import { BaseSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### additionalMembers

`Address[]`
members to add, aside from the currently authenticated user

## Returns

`Promise<SignerResponse<"/v1/multi-owner-create">['result']>`
created multi-owner account
